snippet: Washington beat Boston for the fourth straight time and moved into the N.H.L. lead with 61 points while Florida routed Buffalo to extend a franchise-record streak.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals beat Boston Bruins, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Washington beat Boston for the fourth straight time and moved into the N.H.L. lead with 61 points while Florida routed Buffalo to extend a franchise-record streak.

headline.print_headline: Capitals Grab Points Lead; Panthers Win 10th Straight
headline.main: Capitals Grab Points Lead; Panthers Win 10th Straight
